description:
Momoka`s father wants to test Fuyuki to see if he is worthy of being a sucessor to the Nishizawa Group.  Momoka is desperate to see that he passes.  But when the Keroro Platoon comes up with a crazy idea, she`s not sure she can bear it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka Kakusei! Sanbanme no Momoka de Arimasu
桃華 覚醒! 三番目の桃華 であります
